item.description:
Frank Vignola

>>>>UPDATE>>>>D​ue to the weather, this concert will be held indoors at the auditorium at Saugatuck School, 170 Riverside Avenue in Westport. Still free, still fabulous. Note: the auditorium is air-conditioned and has built-in seats; no food or drink is allowed inside, except for water. Meet in the lobby of the school, will have the BW Scarf with Piano Keys.

   FREE

I have been wanting to hear some Gypsy Jazz!

"Vignola possesses jaw-dropping technique" – Mike Joyce, Washington Post

The guitarist of choice for many greats, from Lionel Hampton and Madonna to Ringo Starr and Wynton Marsalis, Vignola covers everything from Mozart to Black Sabbath. He’s on Wall Street Journal’s “5 Most Admired Guitarists” List and hailed by N.Y. Times as “one of the brightest stars of guitar.”

http://frankvignola.com/video.html

The public is invited to bring picnics, blankets and folding chairs to enhance their Pavilion experience.

The park opens for pre-show picnicking approximately 60 minutes before showtime. There is also an on-site concession with snacks and ice cream.

Parking at the Pavilion
There is free municipal parking all around, including in the lot we share with the Westport Public Library, and the Imperial Avenue and Jesup Green lots.
item.how_to_find_us: will fly the bw scarf with piano keys,meet in lobby of the school.
item.name: Frank Vignola - Django Style!!!
